title: What is JSON?
body:
Whats is Json ?

JSON: JavaScript Object Notation. When exchanging data between a browser and a server, the data can only be text. JSON is text, and we can convert any JavaScript object into JSON, and send JSON to the server.

Why use JSON?:

Since the JSON format is text only, it can easily be sent to and from a server, and used as a data format by any programming language.
